description: This file defines React components for a toggle group UI element, including context management and utility functions. It utilizes Radix UI primitives and enforces styling and behavior for toggle group items.

methods.name: ToggleGroup
methods.description: A React component that renders a toggle group container with shared context for variant and size, forwarding ref and passing children.

methods.name: ToggleGroupItem
methods.description: A React component representing an individual toggle item within the group, consuming context to determine variant and size, and forwarding ref.

ctags.name: ToggleGroup
ctags.pattern: /^const ToggleGroup = React.forwardRef(({ className, variant, size, children, ...props }, ref) => /

ctags.name: ToggleGroupItem
ctags.pattern: /^const ToggleGroupItem = React.forwardRef(({ className, children, variant, size, ...props }, ref)/
